Posts.Content: May 1, 2015 03:27PM Nenabear wrote: My mother is on her 2nd month of ibrance and letrozole. And she is also experiencing the itchiness and not sleeping well. We spoke with her oncologist about the itchiness but he didn't seem to think it was related. :/ Hope you found some relief!
